channel.title: QIAN DENG HOTEL
channel.description: Recent content on QIAN DENG HOTEL

item.title: FAMILY ROOM
item.description: Best for Family with Kids Relax in your 35sqm (376sqf) room, a tranquil haven above the city’s frenetic hum. Pamper yourself with bespoke French amenities and awake refreshed after a night in either one sumptuous king size
